short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects users from Mastodon4 supported instances to their home instance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects you from other Mastodon instances to your own instances equilevant page, so you don't have to manually go to your instance and paste the URL in the search bar.
